price: 241. Gennaaqok caben Agbi islaam diini elle xiqsiisa innal Baqoltil duyye-lc ken Nafsi Satta edde iyyam keh, tama duyye Yallak meesita maral cakkih taniimiy keenil dabaqte kinni.
arabic: وَلِلۡمُطَلَّقَٰتِ مَتَٰعُۢ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walil'muṭallaqāti matāʿun bil-maʿrūfi ḥaqqan ʿalā al-mutaqīna
